statements.select:
select 1 as NoUse from ( select ArticleId,Id,CheckInTime,Status,OperatedBy,OperatedOn,Title,SubTitle,ColumnId,PublishDate,ExpiredDate,Tags,Author,Source,CreatorId,Abstract,Content,Attachments,PreviewMode,Category,AreaId,AreaId2,AreaId3,ShowMode,HomeShowFlag,PicFlag,VideoFlag,NewsFlag,AnonCommentsFlag,VoteFlag,Anonymous_Vote_FLAG,TopFlag,TopDays, (select top 1 FlowFrom from pub_flow where art.ArticleId=BIZ_ID order by CheckInTime desc ) FlowFrom, (select top 1 FlowTo from pub_flow where art.ArticleId=BIZ_ID order by CheckInTime desc ) FlowTo, dbo.FUNC_Pub_GetFlowDefineActionName2(ArticleId,#MappingType#,AreaId,AreaId2,AreaId3) ActionName from Pub_Article art
ArticleId=#ArticleId# Id=#Id# CheckInTime>=to_date(#CheckInTime_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') CheckInTime<=to_date(#CheckInTime_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') Status=#Status# OperatedBy=#OperatedBy# OperatedOn=#OperatedOn# Title=#Title# SubTitle=#SubTitle# ColumnId=#ColumnId# PublishDate>=to_date(#PublishDate_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') PublishDate<=to_date(#PublishDate_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ExpiredDate>=to_date(#ExpiredDate_Start#||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') ExpiredDate<=to_date(#ExpiredDate_End#||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') Tags=#Tags# Author=#Author# Source=#Source# CreatorId=#CreatorId# Abstract=#Abstract# Attachments=#Attachments# PreviewMode=#PreviewMode# Category=#Category# AreaId=#AreaId# AreaId2=#AreaId2# AreaId3=#AreaId3# ShowMode=#ShowMode# HomeShowFlag=#HomeShowFlag# PicFlag=#PicFlag# VideoFlag=#VideoFlag# NewsFlag=#NewsFlag# AnonCommentsFlag=#AnonCommentsFlag# VoteFlag=#VoteFlag# Anonymous_Vote_FLAG=#Anonymous_Vote_FLAG# TopFlag=#TopFlag# TopDays=#TopDays# $WhereClause$
) n
FlowFrom=#FlowFrom# FlowTo=#FlowTo# FlowFrom!=#NonFlowFrom# or FlowFrom is null $WhereClause2$
